title: Tempus AI (NASDAQ:TEM) Research Coverage Started at Mizuho
description: Mizuho started coverage on shares of Tempus AI (NASDAQ:TEM – Free Report) in a research report released on Thursday, MarketBeat Ratings reports. The firm issued an outperform rating and a $100.00 price target on the stock. A number of other research analysts also recently issued reports on TEM. Needham & Company LLC boosted their price [...]

title: ICYMI#TheTribuneOpinion: Is it a quantum leap or distant dream in AI and Indo-US trade deal
description: US officials are courting India, hoping for a trade deal and a Trump visit. India lags in AI and tech compared to China. India's defense sector lacks indigenous engines. The Supreme Court's refusal to hear a case regarding a CM's alleged actions against a minority group raises questions about judicial responsibility.
